mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity (name, start_time, end_time, status, rule, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{status}, #{rule}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE activity SET name = #{name}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, status = #{status}, rule = #{rule}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM activity WHERE start_time > UTC_TIMESTAMP() AND status = 0
SELECT * FROM activity WHERE start_time <= UTC_TIMESTAMP() AND end_time >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() AND status = 1
